lead_paragraph: Rescue crews with the Navy and the Coast Guard were searching for a dozen Marines and the debris of two aircraft that may have collided near Oahu.
snippet: Rescue crews with the Navy and the Coast Guard were searching for a dozen Marines and the debris of two aircraft that may have collided near Oahu.

headline.main: Search for 12 Marines Continues After Hawaii Helicopter Crash
headline.print_headline: Search for 12 Marines Continues After Hawaii Helicopter Crash

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

abstract: Navy and Coast Guard rescue crews search area off Hawaiian coast for signs of 12 Marines aboard two helicopters believed to have crashed in high surf; CH-53E helicopters were deployed for local training mission by Marine Corps Base Hawaii.
